description.zh-cn: 1618年至1648年爆发于欧洲的军事冲突，是欧洲历史上最血腥的宗教战争之一，其结果深刻地改变了欧洲的政治格局。
description.en: A European military conflict that took place from 1618 to 1648, it was one of the bloodiest religious wars in European history and profoundly altered the political landscape of Europe.

description.zh-cn: 一个位于中欧的政治实体，是三十年战争的主要战场和核心参与方，战后进一步碎片化。
description.en: A political entity in Central Europe that was the main theater and a core participant of the Thirty Years' War, becoming further fragmented after the war.

description.zh-cn: 统治神圣罗马帝国、西班牙帝国及奥地利等地的欧洲王室，是三十年战争中天主教阵营的核心力量。
description.en: A European royal house that ruled the Holy Roman Empire, the Spanish Empire, Austria, and other territories, forming the core of the Catholic camp in the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 欧洲主要天主教国家，为削弱哈布斯堡王朝而支持新教阵营，是三十年战争后期反哈布斯堡联盟的领导者和主要受益者。
description.en: A major European Catholic nation that supported the Protestant camp to weaken the House of Habsburg, becoming a leader of the anti-Habsburg coalition in the later stages of the Thirty Years' War and its main beneficiary.

description.zh-cn: 北欧强国，在三十年战争中是反哈布斯堡联盟的主要军事力量，战后崛起为欧洲强权。
description.en: A major Northern European power that was the main military force of the anti-Habsburg coalition in the Thirty Years' War and rose as a great European power after the war.

description.zh-cn: 由哈布斯堡王朝统治的全球性帝国，在三十年战争中是神圣罗马帝国的主要盟友，战后实力大损，逐渐衰落。
description.en: A global empire ruled by the House of Habsburg, it was a major ally of the Holy Roman Empire during the Thirty Years' War. Its power was greatly diminished after the war, leading to its gradual decline.

description.zh-cn: 北欧国家，为控制波罗的海沿岸的德意志诸侯国而介入三十年战争，领导了战争的“丹麦阶段”。
description.en: A Nordic country that intervened in the Thirty Years' War to control the German states along the Baltic coast, leading the 'Danish Phase' of the war.

description.zh-cn: 于1648年签订的一系列条约，结束了三十年战争，并确立了威斯特伐利亚主权体系的基本原则。
description.en: A series of treaties signed in 1648 that ended the Thirty Years' War and established the basic principles of the Westphalian sovereignty system.

nodes.id: 斐迪南二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

zh-cn: 斐迪南二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 神圣罗马帝国皇帝、哈布斯堡王朝成员。其在波希米亚推行的反新教政策直接引发了三十年战争。
description.en: Holy Roman Emperor and a member of the House of Habsburg. His anti-Protestant policies in Bohemia directly triggered the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典国王，卓越的军事统帅。他领导瑞典介入三十年战争，取得了一系列辉煌胜利，但在吕岑会战中阵亡。
description.en: King of Sweden and an outstanding military commander. He led Sweden's intervention in the Thirty Years' War, achieving a series of brilliant victories, but was killed in action at the Battle of Lützen.

nodes.id: 阿尔布雷希特·冯·华伦斯坦

zh-cn: 阿尔布雷希特·冯·华伦斯坦

description.zh-cn: 波希米亚贵族和军事统帅，三十年战争期间帝国军队总司令。后因功高震主被皇帝斐迪南二世下令刺杀。
description.en: A Bohemian nobleman and military commander, commander-in-chief of the imperial armies during the Thirty Years' War. He was later assassinated on the orders of Emperor Ferdinand II due to his immense power and influence.

description.zh-cn: 法国国王路易十三的首席大臣。他主导法国的外交政策，以国家利益为先，支持新教国家对抗哈布斯堡王朝。
description.en: Chief minister to King Louis XIII of France. He guided French foreign policy, prioritizing national interests by supporting Protestant states against the House of Habsburg.

description.zh-cn: 波希米亚新教徒将两名帝国钦差扔出王宫窗外，此事件是波希米亚起义的开端，也是三十年战争的直接导火索。
description.en: Bohemian Protestants threw two imperial governors out of a castle window. This event marked the beginning of the Bohemian Revolt and was the direct trigger of the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 三十年战争的第一个阶段，由波希米亚地区人民反抗哈布斯堡王朝的民族及宗教起义。
description.en: The first phase of the Thirty Years' War, an ethnic and religious uprising by the people of Bohemia against the Habsburg dynasty.

description.zh-cn: 三十年战争早期的一场决定性战役，天主教同盟军在此击败波希米亚起义军，导致波希米亚叛乱失败。
description.en: A decisive early battle in the Thirty Years' War where the Catholic League forces defeated the Bohemian rebels, leading to the failure of the Bohemian Revolt.

description.zh-cn: 三十年战争中的一场关键战役。瑞典军队获胜，但其国王及主帅古斯塔夫二世·阿道夫阵亡。
description.en: A key battle in the Thirty Years' War. The Swedish army was victorious, but its king and commander, Gustavus Adolphus, was killed in action.

description.zh-cn: 一场在三十年战争后期爆发并延续至战后的冲突，主要交战方为法国和西班牙。此战确立了法国的欧洲霸主地位。
description.en: A conflict that broke out in the later stages of the Thirty Years' War and continued after it, primarily between France and Spain. This war established France's dominance in Europe.

description.zh-cn: 由德意志天主教诸侯组成的军事联盟，在三十年战争初期是哈布斯堡皇帝的重要支持力量。
description.en: A military alliance of German Catholic states that was a crucial supporter of the Habsburg Emperor in the early stages of the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 丹麦和挪威国王。他领导丹麦介入三十年战争，开启了战争的“丹麦阶段”，但最终被帝国军队击败。
description.en: King of Denmark and Norway. He led Denmark's intervention in the Thirty Years' War, initiating the 'Danish Phase' of the war, but was ultimately defeated by the Imperial army.

description.zh-cn: 普法尔茨选帝侯，新教联盟领袖。在波希米亚起义期间被选为波希米亚国王，但在白山战役后被迫流亡，被称为“冬日国王”。
description.en: Elector Palatine and leader of the Protestant Union. He was elected King of Bohemia during the Bohemian Revolt but was forced into exile after the Battle of White Mountain, earning him the nickname 'the Winter King'.

description.zh-cn: 布拉格抛窗事件是波希米亚叛乱的直接导火索和开端。
description.en: The Defenestration of Prague was the direct trigger and beginning of the Bohemian Revolt.

description.zh-cn: 波希米亚叛乱是三十年战争的开端和第一阶段。
description.en: The Bohemian Revolt was the beginning and the first phase of the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 《威斯特伐利亚和约》的签订正式结束了三十年战争。
description.en: The signing of the Peace of Westphalia formally ended the Thirty Years' War.

relationships.source: 斐迪南二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 斐迪南二世成为波希米亚国王后，其残酷的禁止和迫害新教的政策引发了波希米亚起义。
description.en: After Ferdinand II became King of Bohemia, his cruel policies of prohibiting and persecuting Protestantism triggered the Bohemian Revolt.

description.zh-cn: 法国为削弱其主要竞争对手哈布斯堡王朝，在三十年战争中支持并直接参与了反哈布斯堡阵营的军事行动。
description.en: To weaken its main rival, the House of Habsburg, France supported and directly participated in the military actions of the anti-Habsburg camp during the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典为争夺波罗的海霸权并支持新教，于1630年介入三十年战争，成为反哈布斯堡阵营的主力。
description.en: Sweden intervened in the Thirty Years' War in 1630 to contend for Baltic supremacy and support Protestantism, becoming the main force of the anti-Habsburg camp.

description.zh-cn: 同属哈布斯堡王朝统治，西班牙帝国在三十年战争中是神圣罗马帝国最主要的盟友。
description.en: Both ruled by the House of Habsburg, the Spanish Empire was the most important ally of the Holy Roman Empire during the Thirty Years' War.

description.zh-cn: 黎塞留作为法国首席大臣，主导了法国在三十年战争期间的政策，即联合新教国家对抗哈布斯堡王朝。
description.en: As Chief Minister of France, Richelieu directed France's policy during the Thirty Years' War, which was to ally with Protestant states against the House of Habsburg.

description.zh-cn: 在黎塞留主导下，法国向瑞典提供资金援助，支持其出兵德意志对抗神圣罗马帝国。
description.en: Under Richelieu's direction, France provided financial aid to Sweden to support its military intervention in Germany against the Holy Roman Empire.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典国王古斯塔夫二世·阿道夫率军在德意志境内多次击败帝国军队，扭转了战局。
description.en: King Gustavus Adolphus of Sweden led his army to defeat the Imperial forces multiple times within Germany, turning the tide of the war.

description.zh-cn: 瑞典国王古斯塔夫二世·阿道夫在吕岑会战中阵亡。
description.en: King Gustavus Adolphus of Sweden was killed in action at the Battle of Lützen.

description.zh-cn: 在白山战役中，由蒂利伯爵率领的天主教同盟军决定性地击败了波希米亚起义军。
description.en: At the Battle of White Mountain, the Catholic League army, led by Count Tilly, decisively defeated the Bohemian rebels.

relationships.source: 斐迪南二世 (神圣罗马帝国)
relationships.target: 阿尔布雷希特·冯·华伦斯坦

description.zh-cn: 因猜忌华伦斯坦的权势和意图，神圣罗马帝国皇帝斐迪南二世下令将其逮捕，最终导致华伦斯坦在海布被其部下刺杀。
description.en: Suspicious of Wallenstein's power and intentions, Holy Roman Emperor Ferdinand II ordered his arrest, which ultimately led to Wallenstein's assassination by his own officers in Eger.

description.zh-cn: 三十年战争和《威斯特伐利亚和约》导致神圣罗马帝国内部诸侯国获得更大的自治权，帝国名存实亡，进一步碎片化。
description.en: The Thirty Years' War and the Peace of Westphalia resulted in the states within the Holy Roman Empire gaining greater autonomy, rendering the empire de facto defunct and further fragmented.

description.zh-cn: 三十年战争削弱了哈布斯堡王朝的势力，使得法国成为欧洲大陆的主导强权。
description.en: The Thirty Years' War weakened the power of the House of Habsburg, allowing France to become the dominant power on the European continent.

description.zh-cn: 丹麦国王克里斯蒂安四世于1625年率军介入冲突，开启了战争的“丹麦阶段”。
description.en: King Christian IV of Denmark intervened in the conflict with his army in 1625, initiating the 'Danish Phase' of the war.

description.zh-cn: 波希米亚议会于1619年8月选出信奉新教的普法尔茨选帝侯腓特烈五世为波希米亚国王。
description.en: In August 1619, the Bohemian Diet elected the Protestant Elector Palatine Frederick V as the King of Bohemia.

description.zh-cn: 在白山战役战败后，腓特烈五世被迫逃亡荷兰，其波希米亚国王的统治结束。
description.en: After being defeated at the Battle of White Mountain, Frederick V was forced to flee to the Netherlands, ending his reign as King of Bohemia.

relationships.source: 斐迪南三世 (神圣罗马帝国)
relationships.target: 斐迪南二世 (神圣罗马帝国)

description.zh-cn: 斐迪南三世是斐迪南二世的儿子，于1637年继承其父的皇位。
description.en: Ferdinand III was the son of Ferdinand II and succeeded his father as emperor in 1637.
